net.sourceforge.fastupload

Class FileFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sourceforge.fastupload.FileFactory

  • public class FileFactory
extends Object
    A factory that indicate which concrete sub class of MultiPart to be created. Also it provides single part threshold limitation , maxContentLength limitation, content type and file extension name filter for form-based upload
    Since:
    0.5.1
    Author:
    Link Qian
    See Also:
    FastUploadParser

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected String allowedExtensions
      allowed file extend name while parsing content header after a boundary
      protected String allowedTypes
      allowed content type while parsing content header after a boundary
      protected String charset
      charset name for FileFactory, initial as JVM default charset name
      protected boolean randomFileName
      if the property is true, the factory generates a universal random name for current MultiPart object;
      protected String repository
      a file system path for storing temporary file while parsing
      protected int threshold
      threshold of file length parsing a single file from multipart/form-data input stream

      FileFactory()

      • createMultiPartFile

        protected MultiPart createMultiPartFile(ContentHeaderMap header)
                                 throws IOException
        create an object extends MultiPart with a ContentHeaderMap parameter. It always create a MemoryMultiPart object when don't find the header is file.
        Parameters:
        header -
        Returns:
        Throws:
